songs.title: Swan Song (Acoustic)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I, I can't lie, I’m scared to open my eyes
'Cause what if I find nothin' at all, nothin’ at all?
What is the point of my lips if they don't make noise? Oh
What is the point of doin' nothin' at all, watchin' it fall?

[Pre-Chorus]
The flicker burning, you know the time is runnin', running out
Only I see, oh, the diamonds, diamonds breaking down
I won't stay quiet, I won't stay quiet
’Cause staying silent’s the same as dyin'
I won’t stay quiet, the flicker's burning now

[Chorus]
This is not a, this is not a swan, swan song
This is not a, this is not a swan, swan song
We just gotta, we just gotta hold on tonight
This is not a, this is not a swan song, swan song, swan dive
It's a new life

[Verse 2]
Real fantasy, wishin' it was make-believe, oh
What is the reason of doin’ nothin' at all, watchin' it fall?

[Pre-Chorus]
The flicker burning, you know the time is runnin', running out
Only I see, oh, the diamonds, diamonds breaking down
I won't stay quiet, I won't stay quiet
'Cause staying silent's the same as dyin'
I won't stay quiet, the flicker's burning now

[Chorus]
This is not a, this is not a swan, swan song
This is not a, this is not a swan, swan song
We just gotta, we just gotta hold on tonight
This is not a, this is not a swan song, swan song, swan dive

[Bridge]
Tread heavily around me
Tread heavily around me
Tread heavily around me
Tread heavily around me

[Chorus]
This is not a, this is not a swan, swan song
This is not a, this is not a swan, swan song
We just gotta, we just gotta hold on tonight
This is not a, this is not a swan song, swan song, swan dive
Yeah, it's a new life
